entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: S 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
